venue.address_2: cross street is Washington Street in Dudley Station
venue.name: Haley House Cafe

item.description:
The Haley Cafe Presents
massmouth's and meet up organizer Norah Dooley and Andrea Lovett telling stories to chill the bones.

A mini workshop on elements of a good story to follow - Then try out your new skills at an Open mic at 8PM
or chat between performances about the art of story.

the series is Art Is Life Itself and is hosted by Nina LaNegra. October 29, 2009 from 7pm to 9pm
At Haley House Cafe where you can find some of the best organic food in Boston
12 Dade St. near Dudley Station - Roxbury,Boston
http://www.haleyhouse...

http://www.artworksfo...
Phone: (617) 445-0900

group.name: CLOSING DOWN THIS MEETUP GROUP: massmouth storytellers

item.name: Stories on a theme -
